They float upon the open sea. Many water Pokémon gather in the area around _____.
It gently holds injured and weak Pokémon in its fins. Its special membrane heals their wounds.
The reason it helps Pokémon in a weakened condition is that any Pokémon coming after them may also attack _____.
Fishermen take them along on long voyages, because if you have an _____ with you, there’ll be no need for a doctor or medicine.
It uses its special mucus to close the wounds of injured Pokémon. The reason for this behavior remains unknown.
Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokémon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
The special membrane enveloping _____ has the ability to heal wounds.
